overview: In this film, which was shot last May and June, Davidson expands on the themes that flowed through her 2018 album, Working Class Woman. We join her in Detroit, Montreal, Barcelona, Lyon, Paris and Berlin, as Davidson ponders her next life chapter, discovering along the way the dicey, stressful and occasionally thrilling nature of life as a touring live act.
tagline: The Canadian artist opens up about life on the road.
title: Between The Beats: Marie Davidson
